void I2C_EEPROM_BufferWrite (u8 *pBuffer, u8 WriteAddr, u16 NumByteToWrite)
 Write numbers of sequential data to EEPROM.
void I2C_EEPROM_BufferRead (u8 *pBuffer, u8 ReadAddr, u16 NumByteToRead)
